snippet.title: Half Life 2: Survivor Ver2.0 on PC
snippet.description:
Half Life 2 Survivor gameplay, running on a regular PC. You can't get this yet, and it isn't very playable, annoyingly the console has been disabled and so that's my first priority.

Now released at: http://facepunch.com/showthread.php?t=1281019
